headline.main: MECHANIC DENIES BOMBSIGHT SALE; Accused Spy Ignorant of What the 'Completed' Device Resembled, He Says

lead_paragraph: A Geman-born mechanic wept on the witness stand yesterday at the Brooklyn espionage trial as he described the treatment accorded him and his wife by Nazi customs officials and secret police agents when the couple returned to Germany for a visit in 1938.
abstract: Espionage: H Lang testifies, Bklyn; contradicts W G Sebold's testimony; describes Berlin meeting with N Ritter; G W Herz withdraws subpoena for Sec Stimson; quotes Stimson statement on Norden bombsight
